content: At the end of April, the Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich association was officially founded. To celebrate this occasion, we are going to be grilling at KÃ¤ferberg! Come to meet Czech and Slovak students and get to know the association itself. We plan to grill, have a bonfire and sing not only Czech and Slovak songs (guitar included).
title: Grill Welcome Event!

content:
Hello and Welcome!
Welcome to the official webpage of Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich!
Stay tuned as we will post soon about what we have planned for you!
